channel.title: Terence Dores Cruz - Postdoctoral Researcher
channel.description: Recent content on Terence Dores Cruz - Postdoctoral Researcher

item.description: Terence D. Dores Cruz is a Postdoctoral Researcher at the Center for Research in Experimental Economics and political Decision making (CREED) at the Universiteit van Amsterdam (Faculty of Business and Economics). Terence currently studies ethical decision-making and the role of (social) information therein at Shaul Shalviâ€™s Behavior Ethics Lab. Terence is completing his PhD in Bianca Beersma’s FORCE-OF-GOSSIP group, where he studied the cooperative and competitive functions of gossip. During his PhD, Terence was also the student-representative for the Kurt Lewin Institute.
